resources.string:
We respect your privacy.
 
 This app does not collect, store, or share any personal data.
 
 We do not use advertisements, analytics, or third-party services.
 
 For any questions, contact us at: bl3880@nyu.edu

Hi, I am Bradley, a student at NYU and an independent developer.
 I used to study cultural heritage, but later switched to computer science to make a living (internship offers are welcome!).

 New York cultural scene is dazzling, and my favorite spot is The Met, a museum so rich in treasures it can be overwhelming.
 I still remember my first visit: over a million artifacts. What should I see? Where are the must-see pieces?

 I realized I was not the only one who felt that way. That is why I created this app:
 to deliver handpicked highlights of The Met in the cleanest, most delightful way possible.

 Feel free to reach out: bl3880@nyu.edu
